00160         static void threadBase( Runner* _runner, NetCache* _cache, unsigned _cur_thread_no, boost::barrier* _barrier)
00161         {
00162             RunDirection dir = _runner->getDirection();
00163 
00164             unsigned layer;
00165             (dir == ForwardRun) ?  (layer = 0) : (layer = _cache->data.size() - 2);
00166 
00167             do {
00168                 //Process current layer
00169                 NetCache::ThreadTaskType* task = &_cache->data[layer][_cur_thread_no];
00170                 for(unsigned i = 0; i < task->size(); ++i)
00171                     _runner->run( (*task)[i] );
00172 
00173                 //Wait for other threads
00174                 _barrier->wait();
00175             } while( (dir == ForwardRun && ++layer < _cache->data.size() - 1) || (dir == BackwardRun && layer-- > 0) );
00176             /*
00177              * A little comment.
00178              * Cache structure:
00179              * Layer1:   thread1_data, thread2_data, ...
00180              * Layer2:   thread1_data, thread2_data, ...
00181              * ...
00182              * LayerN-1: thread1_data, thread2_data, ...
00183              * LayerN:          <= last layer. ALWAYS empty! (see Net::regenerateCache())
00184              * cache.size() == N+1;
00185              * thread_data is vector of NeuronIter
00186              */
00187         };
00188 
00189         /* Debug interface */
00190     public:
00191         void printDebugInfo(std::ostringstream& ost) const
00192         {
00193             
00194             ost<<"Net\n";
00195             ost<<" threadsCount: "<<threadCount<<std::endl;
00196             ost<<" lastNeuronId: "<<lastNeuronId<<std::endl;
00197             ost<<" lastWeightId: "<<lastWeightId<<std::endl;
00198             ost<<" neurons: ";
00199             ConstNeuronIter it = neurons.begin();
00200             for(; it != neurons.end(); ++it)
00201                 ost<<it->first<<" ";
00202             ost<<"\n weights: ";
00203             ConstWeightIter wit = weights.begin();
00204             for(; wit != weights.end(); ++wit)
00205                 ost<<wit->first<<" ";
00206             ost<<"\n inputNeurons: ";
00207             std::list<NeuronIter>::const_iterator it2 = inputNeurons.begin();
00208             for(; it2 != inputNeurons.end(); ++it2)
00209                 ost<<(*it2)->first<<" ";
00210             ost<<"\n\n neurons: ";
00211             for(it = neurons.begin(); it != neurons.end(); ++it)
00212                 it->second.printDebugInfo(ost);
00213             
00214             ost<<"\n\n Cache:\n";
00215             cache.printDebugInfo(ost);
00216         };

00218         /* Serialization */
00219     private:
00220         friend class boost::serialization::access;
00221         template<class Archive>
00222             void save(Archive & ar, const unsigned int version) const
00223             {
00224                 boost::progress_display show_progress( 20 + neurons.size() + 20 );
00225 
00226                 ar & boost::serialization::base_object<Object>(*this);
00227 
00228                 //Saving basic data
00229                 ar & lastNeuronId;
00230                 ar & lastWeightId;
00231                 ar & threadCount;
00232                 ar & biasId;
00233                 ar & neurons;
00234                 show_progress += 10;
00235                 ar & weights;
00236                 show_progress += 10;
00237 
00238                 //Links already saved by 'ar & neurons', but field like 'to' - not
00239                 for(std::map<unsigned, Neuron>::const_iterator iter = neurons.begin(); iter != neurons.end(); ++iter)
00240                 {
00241                     unsigned size = iter->second.links.size();
00242                     ar & size;
00243                     BOOST_FOREACH( const Link& l, iter->second.links )
00244                     {
00245                         Link& link = const_cast<Link&>(l);
00246                         unsigned to = link.getToIter()->first;
00247                         unsigned w  = link.getWeightIter()->first;
00248                         unsigned dir= (unsigned)link.getDirection();
00249                         unsigned latency = (unsigned)link.getLatency();
00250                         ar & to;
00251                         ar & w;
00252                         ar & dir;
00253                         ar & latency;
00254                     }
00255 
00256                     show_progress += 1;
00257                 }
00258                 
00259                 //Saving input neurons
00260                 unsigned size;
00261                 size = inputNeurons.size();
00262                 ar & size;
00263                 BOOST_FOREACH( NeuronIter iter, inputNeurons )
00264                 {
00265                     unsigned id = iter->first;
00266                     ar & id;
00267                 }
00268                 show_progress += 10;
00269 
00270                 //Saving cache
00271                 unsigned layers = cache.data.size();
00272                 ar & layers;
00273                 for(unsigned l = 0; l < cache.data.size(); l++)
00274                 {
00275                     for(unsigned t = 0; t < threadCount; t++)
00276                     {
00277                         unsigned size = cache.data[l][t].size();
00278                         ar & size;
00279                         BOOST_FOREACH( NeuronIter iter, cache.data[l][t] )
00280                         {
00281                             unsigned id = iter->first;
00282                             ar & id;
00283                         }
00284                     }
00285                 }
00286                 show_progress += 10;
00287 
00288                 bool isHintAvailable;
00289                 //Learning hint
00290                 (learningHint != 0) ? (isHintAvailable = true) : (isHintAvailable = false);
00291                 ar & isHintAvailable;                    
00292                 if(isHintAvailable)
00293                 {
00294                     LearningHint::HintId lhintId = learningHint->getTypeId();
00295                     ar & lhintId;
00296                     ar & (*learningHint);
00297                 }
00298                 
00299             };
00300 
00301         template<class Archive>
00302             void load(Archive & ar, const unsigned int version)
00303             {
00304                 ar & boost::serialization::base_object<Object>(*this);
00305 
00306                 //Restoring basic data
00307                 ar & lastNeuronId;
00308                 ar & lastWeightId;
00309                 ar & threadCount;
00310                 ar & biasId;
00311                 ar & neurons;
00312                 boost::progress_display show_progress(20 + neurons.size() + 20);
00313                 show_progress += 10;
00314                 ar & weights;
00315                 show_progress += 10;
00316                
00317                 //Loading links data, converting neuron ID's to iterators
00318                 for(NeuronIter iter = neurons.begin(); iter != neurons.end(); ++iter)
00319                 {
00320                     unsigned size;
00321                     ar & size;
00322                     for(unsigned i = 0; i < size; i++)
00323                     {
00324                         unsigned to, w, dir, latency;
00325                         ar & to;
00326                         ar & w;
00327                         ar & dir;
00328                         ar & latency;
00329                         NeuronIter to_it = neurons.find(to);
00330                         WeightIter  w_it = weights.find(w);
00331                         if(to_it == neurons.end() || w_it == weights.end())
00332                             throw Exception::FilesystemError()<<"Net::load(): can't load Net object. "
00333                                                                               "Archive possibly damaged\n";
00334                         iter->second.links.push_back(Link(to_it, (Link::Direction)dir, w_it, latency));
00335                     }
00336                     show_progress += 1;
00337                 }
00338 
00339                 //Loading list of input neurons
00340                 inputNeurons.clear(); //may be we loading saved net into existing net with neurons?
00341                 unsigned size;
00342                 ar & size; 
00343                 for(unsigned i = 0; i < size; i++)
00344                 {
00345                     unsigned id; ar & id;
00346                     NeuronIter iter = neurons.find(id);
00347                     inputNeurons.push_back(iter);
00348                     if(iter == neurons.end())
00349                         throw Exception::FilesystemError()<<"Net::load(): can't load Net object. "
00350                                                                 "Archive possibly damaged\n";
00351                 }
00352                 show_progress += 10;
00353 
00354                 //Loading cache
00355                 cache.flush();
00356                 unsigned layers;
00357                 ar & layers;
00358                 for(unsigned l = 0; l < layers; l++)
00359                 {
00360                     cache.data.push_back(NetCache::FrontType()); //add new layer to cache
00361                     for(unsigned t = 0; t < threadCount; t++)
00362                     {
00363                         cache.data[l].push_back(NetCache::ThreadTaskType()); //add new thread task info to current layer
00364                         unsigned size;
00365                         ar & size;
00366                         for(unsigned n = 0; n < size; n++)
00367                         {
00368                             unsigned id;
00369                             ar & id;
00370                             NeuronIter iter = neurons.find(id);
00371                             cache.data[l][t].push_back(iter);
00372                             if(iter == neurons.end())
00373                                 throw Exception::FilesystemError()<<"Net::load(): can't load Net object. "
00374                                                                         "Archive possibly damaged\n";
00375                         }
00376                     }
00377                 }
00378                 cache.fixed();
00379                 show_progress += 10;
00380 
00381                 bool isHintAvailable;
00382                 //Learning hint
00383                 ar & isHintAvailable;
00384                 if(isHintAvailable)
00385                 {
00386                     LearningHint::HintId lhintId;
00387                     ar & lhintId;
00388                     learningHint = LearningHint::getById(lhintId);
00389                     ar & learningHint;
00390                 }
00391             };
00392
